1.content:
First things first. How will the story go?

Serious approach: Nothing random everything make sense. Pretty much a straight forward story
Action adventure: Very fun and action packed. Basic story. May have unexpected twists and violence.
Comedy: Fun story. Has a happy ending. Could have funny things in it.
War: Self explained. Starts with a War setting.
Random: Anything can happen.
1.title: What to expect?

choices: Nightmare gets ready to attack Dark
Dark already knows they are there and attacks
12.content:
Dark fights with Mavis
Dark the Shadow is a rare winged hedgehog who is known as being a archer. Mavis the Darkite is a brutal general who has been hired to destroy anything that gets in his way. He rides a dragon named Nightmare which has the ability to confuse and control his enemies.
Now it begins in a cathedral. Dark was standing in front of a iconic structure of Jesus. He wasn't worshiping it, but he was admiring the artwork and significance of the sculpture.
Dark: (thinking) Wow the people who made this really paid attention to detail. Hmm another example of God's handiwork through people. (turns around) Well I guess I might as well be off with my day. (walks out of the cathedral)(flies off to a cave)
Mavis was patroling around on his dragon Nightmare. He is planning an invasion against the Shadows, but needs to study the area to see the status of the Shadow warriors.
Mavis:(thinking) Looks like the Shadows are not out yet. (to Nightmare) Alright we can rest by that cave for a few minutes. (lands)
Nightmare: (in a deep voice) I sense that someone else is here. We must go somewhere else.
Mavis: Relax it's probably just a sleeping crystal monster.
Dark: (lands in front of the cave) I wonder where they are at?
Mavis: (sees Dark) Nightmare look! a Shadow.
Nightmare: Yes I see.
Mavis: Want to send him a "surprise welcome"
Nightmare: (laughs) At your command.

What happens next?
12.title: Characters (where it all begins)

123.content: ???: Nightmare, stand down, I look like a shadow, but I'm not one, Thanks to your master. Mavis: Ah, Hello Hypon. Hypon: Hello Master.
123.title: The Second-in-Command

1231.content:
Continue
Mavis and Hypon
Hypon: Hello master.
Mavis: Who do you think you are commanding my dragon. I should kill you but I will not.
Hypon: (thinking) "I am a shadow spy oh wait bad idea. I mean I ..." Sorry master.
Mavis: I don't think you are a Darkite. Who are you! (hands start glowing blue) (can read minds)
Hypon: (doesn't answer)

What happens next?
1231.title: Dark see this

12313.content: Dark: Hypon, are you working for Mavis? Hypon stays silent. Mavis: Are you with me or against me? If you are, kill Dark. Choose his Fate.
12313.title: Dark comes in

123131.content:
Continue
Hypon and Dark
Mavis: So what will it be. (manipulates his mind)
Hypon: (glowing white eyes) (attacks Dark)
Dark: (dodges the attack) Hypon this is not you!
Hypon: (doesn't reply and continues attacking)

What happens next?
123131.title: Attack Dark

1231311.content: Dark and Hypon starts to fight. Hypon sends for deadly combos to his arms. Then his right leg to make him kneal. And throws him into a wall. Dark: Hypon, snap out of it. Hypon: (weakly) D..Dark. Mavis: No, obey me. Hypon: (eyes change back) No! (attack Mavis)
1231311.title: Continue

12313111.content:
Continue
Mavis and Hypon
Mavis: (gets in a defensive position)
Hypon: (grows red claws and swings them)
Dark: (eyes glow and powers up)
Mavis: (blocks the attack with a temporary force field) (pushes Hypon back)
Hypon: This guy is pretty tough.
Dark: I know now stand back.
Hypon: (jumps to the side)
Dark: (fires a laser)
Mavis: (gets hit and burns) Ah! (falls to the ground)
Hypon: Is he dead?
Dark: No, but he is defeated.
Mavis: (gets up but has burn marks and scars) This isn't the end you know. (summons his dragon)
Nightmare: (picks him up and flies off)
Hypon: Glad that's over with.

What happens next
12313111.title: Continue

123132.content:
Continue
Hypon attacks Mavis.
Mavis: So what is it then.
Hypon: (Pulls our his blade and attacks Mavis)
Mavis: (dodges the attack and shoots a beam)
Dark: I will never understand Night-bloods) (watches for Nightmare)
Nightmare: (roars) Why does this always happen?
Dark: What?

What happens next?
123132.title: Attack Mavis

1231322.content: Hypon: Mavis, you'll pay for what you did to me! (attack him and then telports behind him and slashs him with a sword)
1231322.title: Hypon's True Rage

12313221.content:
Continue
Mavis and Hypon
Mavis: (gets cut and bruised) That's will cost you. (sticks his glowing hand out)
Hypon: (freezes) What the...can't move.
Mavis: (throws Hypon and shoots some beams)
Hypon: (hits a wall and gets hit) Ah!
Mavis: (moves his hand again and pulls Hypon out again)
Hypon: (freezes) Crap! Where is help when you need...owah!
Mavis: (punches Hypon several times)
Dark: That's enough! (shoots a flurry of arrows at Mavis)
Mavis: (gets interrupted and hit with the arrows)
Hypon: (falls to the floor) Thanks I needed that.
Dark: It's not over yet!

What happens next?
12313221.title: Continue

123132212.content:
"HEY! MAVIS! PUT HYPON DOWN, OR I'LL FRY YOU INTO ANOTHER DIMENSION!"
Mavis immediately dropped Hypon upon seeing the giant creature wearing a HUGE set of golden armor and holding a humongous, blue burning sword in one hand, and what appeared to be a ten-barrelled shotgun in the other, pointed at Mavis' chest and head. Mavis and Hypon then decide to faint in disbelief and terror, and woke up...
123132212.title: Someone new arrives

1231322121.content:
This doesn't make sense.
Continue
A strange character appears
Dark: What the? Who are you?
? : (looks at Mavis) Put him down or I will fry you in another dimension!
Mavis: (looks at him,drops Mavis and faints from losing energy from the arrows)
?: (thinking he fainted under his prescence of disbelief and terror) Now I will take you to my ship.
Dark: Not so fast! Who are you and what do you want with him!
?: That is none of your concern. You can call me Stranger but now I have some business to take care of. (teleports away with Mavis)
Dark: Stranger? I think I heard about ...oh great. (sees Nightmare)
Nightmare: (growls)
Dark: Good bye. (flies away)
Meanwhile with Mavis and Stranger.
Mavis: (wakes up on a giant starship) Where am I?
Stranger: My ship.

What happens next?
1231322121.title: On a GIANT STARSHIP

choices: They are actually in a base
1231322122.content:
Continue
The house.
Mavis: (wakes up in his own house) How did I get here?
His dragon Nightmare shows up.
Mavis: Huh, oh hey there Night. I am sorry for that little dispute.
Nightmare: (in broken English. Dragon accent) It's good. Learning English is the challenge.
Mavis: Yeah but how did I get here and where is Hypon.
Hypon appears
Hypon: Right here some weird creature brought us here. Say is this your house?

What happens next?
1231322122.title: In some random house

1232.content:
Continue
Dark attacks Hypon.
Dark: (aiming his arrow)
Hypon: So what is the status?
Mavis: We can do nothing until we find a Shadow.
Suddenly a arrow flies by and hits Hypon.
Mavis: Who goes there!
Dark: (turning invisible) (jumps behind Hypon)
Nightmare: Hypon look out!
Hypon: (screaming in pain) (turns around quick)
Dark: (turns visible and kicks him in the face)
Hypon: (falls over)

What happens next?
1232.title: Dark attacks Hypon

12321.content: Hypon: Dark, you jerk, we were friends and this is how you repay me? Dark: You serve Mavis. Hypon: (silence and tries to heal himself)
12321.title: Continue

123211.content:
Continue
Dark and Hypon.
Hypon: (pulls out the arrow and heals himself) You ruined my plan. (Gets in a defensive pose)
Dark: What plan. (gets in a defensive pose)
Nightmare: What should we do?
Mavis: Let them figure it out. (watches)

What happens next?
123211.title: Continue

1232112.content: Hypon: This Plan. (telports behind Mavis and stabs him in the back several times and crushs his hands) Dark, finish him.
1232112.title: Dark and Hypon attack Mavis

12321121.content:
Continue
Dark and Mavis
Mavis: (restores his hands) (screams)
Nightmare: (Rhino's Hypon)
Hypon: (Hits the ceiling) Hurry up!
Dark: (teleports through Mavis) (heartstopper)
Mavis: (fields) (defensive move that disrupts a heart stopper) (stands up) You missed. (flips to the top of Nightmare)
Nightmare: (starts running out of the cave)
Hypon: Get him.
Dark: Let him go. He knows when he is defeated.
Hypon: I just wish he would die.
Dark: Revenge is not worth it.
Hypon: I don't care I am just glad he is gone.

What happens next?
12321121.title: Continue

125.content:
Dark is a Shadow. The Shadows are a people group that live on the planet Metropolis. The Shadows live in a forest called Windy Willows. Windy Willows is a dark mysterious forest with many trees. In the forest lives creatures called "unknowns" which are mostly parasites. The Shadows have figured out ways to control the unknowns and have kept them from overpowering them. (The unknowns will come in later)
The Shadows were formed when the Darkites came. The Shadows are a people group that consists mostly of wolves, hedgehogs, and foxes. Although there are other types of animals Dark is the Commander. The Shadow history connects with the Darkite history because they were formed after the Darkites were formed.
The Darkites are a group that lives near the Darkites. They live by the Cave of Wonders which is a cave that contains crystal monsters. The Darkites and crystal monsters or crystals share the same home even though they don't get along too well. The Darkite commander is Mavis. The Darkites were a people group that was created to protect Metropolis from invaders. However the Darkites became corrupted and started trying to take over the planet.
The Darkites are like Shadows except they try to destroy things. The Darkites were not always corrupted. They became corrupted when the Unknowns started infecting them. The Darkites that kept themselves uninfected becameunited and formed a group called Shadows. That is the basic story of the Darkites and Shadows. The Crystals and Unknowns will be described in other chapters.
Continue
Nightmare: So you really want to attack now. We don't even know very much about the area.
Mavis: It's for our master.

What happens next?
125.title: Backround and story

info.brief_description: Who are the Darkites? Who are the Shadows? They are both people groups
info.description:
Rules
1.) No sex or nudity
2.) No cursing
3.) No death of the main character (violence is allowed)
4.) Other character are allowed as long as they fit into the story or are approved by me. (please explain your character before adding)
5.) Have fun

The Darkites are a brutal people group mixed with animals and humans. The Shadows are a that defends their home from Darkites. They are friendly, but most of them are foxes or wolves.

Other groups may be added. (I will add to this so patience is appreciated)
